unnormalised: Borem, mhaka fattli palli hanv sthanik bazarak geli, tuka khobor asa, andherintlea mhojea ghara laginch asa to. Mhaka jevnnak kaim bore puranne sambar korunk zai aslem. Soglleach vostunchi kimot voir voitat! Mhaka ugddas asa jednam tematam fattim fakt Rs. 20/kg aslem. Atam? Tem ₹80 per kg minimum bhaxen asa!
normalised: Borem, mhaka fatlea sumanant hanv eka sthanik bazarak gel’lom, tumkam khobor asa, Andherintlea mhojea ghorchea laginchim. Mhaka ratcho jevnna khatir thodde bore puranne sambar korchea khatir axil’lem. Soglleanche kimot voir voir choddtta! Mhaka ugddas asa jeunva tankam tomatanchi kimot fokot rupiya vis ek kilogram asli. Atam? Tem rupiya assi ek kilogram minimum zalam!

unnormalised: Poilem, hanv bhaji vikrean lagim ravli. Mhaka atleak atlem 1/2 kg tematam, 250 gms kande, ani dhnneacho ek dhaktto punzo zai aslo. Bhaji vikrean 100 gms mirsangak Rs. 30 sangtalem! Hanv taka sanglem, "Bhaiyya, itna mehenga?" Tannem fakt kanpallo haloilo. Vaddop asa mhonn tannem sanglem. Hanvem fakt 200 g mirsang ghetli fokot sambarank puro tevhdi.
normalised: Poile, hanv bhaji vikpeache dukana voir thamblom. Mhaka atleach ek kilogram nimm tomat, don xembhar panchvis grams kanande, ani koriyanandrachim ek lhan bandhni zai asli. Vikpe vallean rupiya tis ek xembhar grams capsicum khatir sangl’lem! Hanvem taka sanglem, "Bhaiyya, itna mehenga?" Tanne fokot khando halaylo. Vadh, tannem sangl’lem. Hanvem fokot don xembhar grams capsicum gheun bandh kelo zaitich sambarak.

unnormalised: Uprant, hanv kirnneachea dukhan geli. Mhaka dal zai asli, khobor asa. Hanv sadharonnponnim Tata Sampann toor dal ghetam. 1 kg pack-ache Rs. 140 asle. Hanvem 1/4 kg chinchechi paste (Rs. 60) ani sambar powder-achi dhaktte battli ghetli.
normalised: Uprant, hanv kirana dukana voir gel’lom. Mhaka dal zai asli, nischit. Hanv sadharanpan T-A-T-A Sampann toor dal gheun. Ek kilogram packa khatir rupiya ek xembhar chaliskim kimot asli. Hanvem ek chothai kilogram tamarind paste rupiya sixty, ani sambar powderachi ek lhan botol gheun dharli.

unnormalised: Uprant ashchory ailem. Mhaka tandull gheunk zai asle. Sadharonnponnim, hanv 5 kgs basmati tandull ghetam. Te Rs. 450 asle. Fattlim mahinea te fakt Rs. 400 asle! Hanvem dukan vikreanank vicharlem, "Kitem ghoddlem?" Tannem mhaka sanglam pausachea kallak lagun purvonnacher porinnam zala mhonn.
normalised: Uprant sorprend jhalem. Mhaka tandul gheun zai asle. Sadharanpan, hanv panch kilograms basmati tandul gheun. Tanchi kimot rupiya char xembhar panchasshi asli. Fatlea mhoinyam fokot rupiya char xembhar aslim! Hanvem dukandarachem vicharlem, "Kitem zhalem?" Tannem mhaka sanglem ki pavsa kalacho lagun purvonnache problem zaleat.

unnormalised: Soglle milovn, hanvem sade sambar jevnnak lagun ₹1000 khorch kele! Kimti kitli voir geleat tem besh dhakhol asa, sarka na? Mhaka mhujim jevnnam bore bhaxen yojunk zai ani jevhddem possible asa tednam kaim vostu eksarkhem gheunk zai. Fuddli palli, hanv fokot khichdi kortelim.
normalised: Sogllean mellun, hanvem fokot ek xembhar rupiya sodeache sambar jevnna khatir kharch kele! Tem kitlem divann zavnkim kimot choddtta, haka tumkam mandta? Mhaka atam mhoje jevnanchi yojna vadhik kaallji gheun korunk zai ani jitlem xokta titlem zaite gheunk favo. Udentchea vellar, hanv fokot khichdi kortalem.
